creator: richard.peckett@outlook.com
text:
Created attachment 32914
menu options for adding items to test plan don't expand out

I'm running the latest version of JMeter on a Windows 8 desktop and I can't add anything to the test plans because the menus don't expand out and show any options.

I've tried downloading a fresh zip and extracting it again in case of corruption but the issue persists.

OS is 64 bit windows 8, 64bit JDK

creator: richard.peckett@outlook.com
text:
Worked out what the problem was

JAVA_TOOL_OPTIONS appeared to be causing issues:

Picked up JAVA_TOOL_OPTIONS: -javaagent:"C:\Program Files\LogiGear\TestArchitect\binclient\agents\java\lib\ext\TAJavaLoader.jar"
java version "1.7.0_79"
Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (build 1.7.0_79-b15)
Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (build 24.79-b02, mixed mode)

Once I removed JAVA_TOOLS_OPTIONS values from the system environment variables, it worked. Hopefully it might help anyone else who encounters this problem in the future.

Closed - not a bug.
